title: Microsoft Purview | Data loss prevention: Support for complex conditions (U.S. government clouds)
description:
,With this update, you will be able to create complex conditions while configuring your Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies. You will be able to create conditions with AND/OR combinations with the ability to create groups to achieve condition combinations like A AND (B OR C).
GA date: March CY2023
Preview date: January CY2023
